task.title: Starting the Engine Manually
task.shortdesc: Procedure for starting an engine using the hand crank on early automobiles.

prereq.p: Ensure the vehicle is in a safe, well-ventilated area with the parking brake engaged.
Be aware of potential backfire risks and avoid cranking downward against compression.

step.cmd: Locate the starting crank at the front of the car
Grip the starting crank handle firmly
step.stepxmp: Push the handle toward the car until you feel the crank ratchet engage

step.cmd: Lift the crank upward with a quick, decisive swing
Prime the if the engine is cold

substep.cmd: Pull the small wire at the lower left corner of the radiator
Give the engine two or three quarter turns with the starting handle

result.p: The engine should now be running. Allow it to warm up before driving.
